vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.22.8;
son of: Imlah (H3229)
§ Micah or Micaiah or Michaiah = "who is like God"
1) an Ephraimite during the period of the judges
2) son of Imlah and a prophet of Samaria who predicted the defeat and death of king Ahab of Israel
3) son of Gemariah in the time of Jeremiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) מִיכָה   hombre; región de Efraín; (b) ֶמִיכָה   hombre; hijo de Imlá; profeta; en tiempos de Ahab; (c)   hombre; hijo de Guemarías; en tiempos de Joaquim
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米迦 或 米該雅 或 米該亞 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "誰像神" (參見[4318][4320] )
1) 士師時代的一位以法蓮人 (士 17:1)
2) 音拉的兒子, 北國以色列的一個先知, 他預言了以色列王亞哈的戰敗和被殺 (王上 22)
3) 耶利米時代的人, 基瑪利的兒子 (耶 36:11)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
米迦 或 米该雅 或 米该亚 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "谁像神" (参见[4318][4320] )
1) 士师时代的一位以法莲人 (士 17:1)
2) 音拉的儿子, 北国以色列的一个先知, 他预言了以色列王亚哈的战败和被杀 (王上 22)
3) 耶利米时代的人, 基玛利的儿子 (耶 36:11)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Jer.36.11;
son of: Gemariah (H1587H)
§ Micah or Micaiah or Michaiah = "who is like God"
1) an Ephraimite during the period of the judges
2) son of Imlah and a prophet of Samaria who predicted the defeat and death of king Ahab of Israel
3) son of Gemariah in the time of Jeremiah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.17.1
Another spelling of mi.khah (מִיכָה "Micah" H4318)
§ Micah or Micaiah or Michaiah = "who is like God"
1) an Ephraimite during the period of the judges
2) son of Imlah and a prophet of Samaria who predicted the defeat and death of king Ahab of Israel
3) son of Gemariah in the time of Jeremiah
